title: PESU Admission 2025 based on JEE
content: Pls drop your JEE percentile and the branch offered & PES campus based on JEE score. PES has not published the list, above will help folks to know the trend.

comments.body: 96.x for ECE @RR campus (selected first preference as CSE and second ECE)
jee mains seats share is 40% now right?
94.3 and dint get anything
yes
hows that possible? I saw a comment in different grp stating 92.8 he got ECE in ECC campus
may be 92.x guy selected first preference asÂ  EC campus..seems EC campus is less preferred than RR campusÂ
45, I saw it just today on the website, missed registration so couldn't upload first attempt jee marks
How much for cse at ec campus and rr campus??
what is the cut off thru mains for cse and cse(AIML) at rr campus??

95 %ile got this ðŸ¤£

https://preview.redd.it/p303ychc51me1.png?width=815&format=png&auto=webp&s=32bdcfa57590c05177df86043801e7f28539067f

its damn fucked up my friend who got 90%tile got cs in ec campus. I had called them and i dont think they found my applicationðŸ’€. Anyways they asked me to send a mail and i did so ig we will see what happens
did you apply for EC campus too or just RR?

https://preview.redd.it/v8cuam1y51me1.png?width=1469&format=png&auto=webp&s=0401bc251af14a6ec6465e105c655ee26a52073b

This was my preference list btw and they say the preference number has no bearing so that cant be it
LMFAOOO GOT THE SAME MSG AT 94.3%TILE. PES is just a hater fr lmfaoooo

mate i thought the priority order works like how it works for mains so i went  
cs rr , ai rr , cs ec , ai ec  
looking back i should have probably put cs ec in first knowing i woudnt have gotten cs rr. But what kinda bs is this that i dont get cs ec just cause its my third choice compared to someone's first choice when i clearly have 2-3 %ile more than them.
ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ did you try connecting w them? cause ive seen a couple of people who've gotten much lower get in
bwahaha this was my exact pref order as well and i didnt get shit ðŸ¤£.
in the website it mentions that the preference order has no bearing in seat assignment so its not that fs they probably just messed something up
ye i called them and they asked me to mail it to them and i did. I am waiting to hear back but honestly i dont have much hope left
PES is new to online counselling... so maybe they messed it up...
Bro branch>>>campus.
any updates?
nope
i got the same msg at 95.5xx
same message at 94.2 as well they fr playing with us lmao
99.5, got cse at rr road (first preference).

Clearly PES has messed up big time. All they had to do was to create a relative ranking bass in JEE percentile and fill the seats from top to down as per preference and availability. If an engineering college can't do even this much is it even worth it!
exactly. i still dont understand how is it justified to give a seat to the ones who have got around 90-92 but not to the the people who have scored 94-95ish??
What nonsense is this who the hell chooses biotech over a branch u like just to get the campus, are u insane? Do u even know about biotech? Also eee? Are u sure u can do core?
Maybe they are considering other factors like state residence, 10th marks etc in addition to jee percentile?
calm down man they make you choose 9ðŸ˜­. If it were up to me i would have opted only for cs
95, got CSE at EC
Was this filled as ur first preference?
Did you not get anything for a similar %ile asw?
No 2nd, I had cse RR as 1st
Why tf are you going to PES in the first place?
Nope. Won't be taking this. Why the hell the fee would be 5 lakh for 99.5+ percentile?.  Will get much better clg options
Will I get anything in 91% jee main in cs? I have not registered yet so I don't know
same doubt
